content: DX 6 MX Powder-actuated nailer with magazine Fully automatic powder-actuated nailer with magazine for fastening collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Nail magazine included – 10 fasteners can be driven in quick succession before reloading One-step energy level setting – expanded on-tool power adjustment means you can use a single cartridge color for many fastenings Higher productivity – automatic piston return and cartridge advancement equip you to work up to 5 times faster than alternative fastening methods Easy to operate – precise control helps to deliver consistent, more accurate fastening On-board display – shows when your nailer needs cleaning or maintenance Applications Fastening wood and metal sheet to concrete, sand-lime block masonry or steel Fastening 2x4s to concrete Attaching drainage foils and membranes to concrete or CMU block Fastening perimeter wall track, deflection or slip clips to concrete and steel Installing Hilti formstop elements on concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 19.1 x 2.7 x 7.5 in Weight: 8 lb. Fastener Intake: Collated Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 19.1 x 2.7 x 7.5 in | Weight | 8 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.51 - 2.83 in | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | No | Power (max.) | 335 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-6-5-P8 ### ITEMS- 3806335 -
